abstract.p: Correction of caption with June 18 photo of singer Dianne Reeves

block.p: The caption with a picture of the singer Dianne Reeves in the New Jersey section on Sunday omitted information about her performance. Ms. Reeves will be performing at 8 p.m. tomorrow at the John Harms Center for the Performing Arts in Englewood, N.J. Ticket information is available at (201) 567-3600. The band Lit, referred to in the caption, will indeed appear at 10 p.m. tomorrow at the Trump Taj Mahal in Atlantic City. Ticket information is available at (609) 449-1000.
